about_the_game:
Explore a new fantasy story in the global version of Glory Destiny - Reborn! Step into a whole new world with new classes, innovative gameplay, and thrilling adventures in the classic MMORPG.

Return to the Forest Kingdom, defend your homeland, and join the Shield of Glory as a new-generation hero. Fight alongside legendary champions to reclaim peace in a vibrant, magical realm.

[Exclusive New Class for the Global Version]

A mysterious new class debuts in the global edition: the Celestial Priest, a master of starry divination. Harness the power of constellations and blend advanced technologies to command multi-elemental magic in combat. This hybrid style excels in both melee and ranged combat, delivering visually stunning battles and a unique gameplay experience.

[Exclusive New Gameplay for the Global Version]

Introducing new adventure partners and explore the fun of collecting! Innovative pet matching gameplay allows player to raise unique, adorable species while enjoying the benefits of enhanced combat power. Dive into nurturing fantastical creatures for a richer social and progression experience..

[Enhanced Quality-of-Life Features]

Fast Travel: Saves time and focus on the adventure.

Equipment Set Quick Switching: Adapt instantly to battle scenarios for peak performance.

Batch Crafting: Streamline crafting with efficient mass production.

Instant Channel Switching: Switch without delays for seamless gameplay.

[Visual and UI Interface Upgrades]

Immerse yourself in fairy tale-like environments. The global edition features enhanced character creation scenes and interface designs, blending refined aesthetics with intuitive gameplay for an immersive experience.

[Multilingual Support and Chat Translation]

Play without borders! The global version supports multiple languages, including Chinese, English, Japanese, and Thai. Real-time chat translation bridges communication gaps for a global community. Robust anti-cheat mechanisms ensure a fair and clean gaming environment for all adventurers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10/Win11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 2.8 GHz and above, AMD K8 2600+
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8400 and above, ATI Radeon X1600 and above
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10/Win11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.66 GHz and above, AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 9500 and above, ATI Radeon HD4570 and above
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
